alert.note: Alert for Prince George; Surry; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 6:46PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Prince George, north central Sussex and west central Surry Counties, the City of Hopewell and the City of Petersburg through 730 PM EDT... At 645 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Petersburg, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rainfall of up to one inch. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Prince George around 650 PM EDT. Disputanta around 710 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include New Bohemia, Richard Bland College, Templeton, Petersburg National Battlefield, Barham and Prince George Golf. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
